# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [1.0.0] - 2024-11-03

### Added

- Initial public release of Infinium Python SDK
- Synchronous and asynchronous client implementations
- Comprehensive error handling with custom exception hierarchy
- Automatic retry logic with exponential backoff
- Client-side rate limiting capabilities
- Type-safe interfaces with full type hints
- Input validation for all API calls
- Batch operation support for multiple tasks
- Specialized data models for different agent types
- Production-ready logging and monitoring features
- Complete test suite with high coverage
- Professional documentation and examples

### Changed

- Updated API base URL to https://api.i42m.ai
- Improved package structure for public distribution
- Enhanced documentation for professional use

### Security

- Secure credential handling with environment variable support
- Input validation to prevent injection attacks
- Rate limiting to prevent API abuse
